Description: Rim and neck sherd of South Ionian pottery krater; inside, reserved except for black band below rim; on top of rim zig-zag between bands, outside and underside glazed; on neck, between bands, metopal frieze of maeanders and squares filled with X and blobs; remains of pattern band at top of shoulder.
Curator's comments: Schlotzhauer dates the piece in the early sixth century, while Nadine Pantaleon would place it slightly earlier (Die Kratere der archaische Zeit aus Naukratis, unpublished dissertation, Bochum, 2011, 283, Naukr.2),
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GE.022)
Schlotzhauer 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus Naukratis (p. 126, Nau 88, pl. 20c)
